analysis.description:
OLdxrpct (/unique_chucks/23/0xb7f7d252535d7fd4cfc06ae48206405190e12da6.sol#98-105) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0xb7f7d252535d7fd4cfc06ae48206405190e12da6.sol#98-99)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0xb7f7d252535d7fd4cfc06ae48206405190e12da6.sol:
	Contract Nyomi has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0xb7f7d252535d7fd4cfc06ae48206405190e12da6.sol#238-240)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0xb7f7d252535d7fd4cfc06ae48206405190e12da6.sol:
